attributes.action: Remove VAT on New Mopeds (up to 125cc)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the congestion on the roads it would  make sense to get people out of their cars. One moped takes up a lot less space on the road, uses less fuel and requires less space to park. The new mopeds give out less emissions. I think this would help people get on to mopeds.
